item.description:
Our November Boston BizSpark Meetup will be held on Wednesday, November 18th at HubSpot HQ located at 25 First Street, 2nd Floor in Cambridge. This is a new location for BizSpark and I wanted to introduce HubSpot and its new offices to our local BizSpark community.

At 6:30 PM Robert Sanchez, founder of Conversation Media, will pitch his family location mobile application service TouchBase and at 7 PM Brough Turner will pitch his business broadband startup netBlazr to Christopher Mirabile of Race Point Capital for potential next steps in the funding process.

Then at 7:30 PM Mike Volpe will give his presentation "Startup Marketing Tips from 3 Years at HubSpot".

Mike Volpe is VP of Inbound Marketing at HubSpot, an Internet marketing software startup, where he leads the company's lead generation and branding strategy through inbound marketing, including blogging, search engine optimization, video marketing, and social media. Since Mike joined HubSpot, the company has grown from about a dozen beta customers to over 2,800 customers, from 5 employees to 160 employees, and raised $33 million of venture capital in two rounds of financing.

Afterwards we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any startup-related issues members are facing.

Please RSVP and bring guests. We're always open to suggestions for topics for experts to speak on as well.

-Marsh Sutherland
item.name: Startup Marketing Tips w/ Mike Volpe | ConversationMedia & netBlazr Live Pitches
